name: Save The Mess
description:
Aliens came to earth to help humans clean up the planet but you discovered that their real goal is to use that garbage to make a weapon that will destroy humanity, so your goal is to kill those aliens and let there be chaos.

How To Play :

you have to save the mess until the time is over, alien can't kill you, but they will destroy the garbage so you must save it

Movement :

A or Left Arrow to move to the left 

D or Right Arrow to move the right 

W, Space or Up Arrow to jump & you can jump higher by holding jump keys longer

Shooting with the mouse

Hope That You'll Like It, Please Rank It And Leave A Comment Thanks, Everyone.

You can find me on Twitter :  https://twitter.com/ChickenGames8
